field.label: Error as Warning
field.comment: Error messages will be displayed as a warning styled message.

group.label: Redirect
group.comment: The 'redirect' evaluation result type empowers developers to redirect customers to an internal or external URL. The specific behavior of a redirect result type is determined by various configurable settings, outlined below.

field.label: Enable Confirmation Dialog
field.comment: Activates the redirect confirmation dialog, which prompts users to confirm, before being redirected to an external URL. The dialog will be displayed only if it has been explicitly set and enabled, or if the 'Force' option is selected. Note that user confirmation will only be requested for external URLs.

field.label: Confirmation Message
field.comment: This message serves as the default confirmation message, for cases in which a confirmation dialog is set to be forced, and there is no explicitly set on the redirect instance.

field.label: Enable Notification Dialog
field.comment: Activates the redirect notification dialog, providing users with a heads-up before being redirected. The dialog will be displayed only if it has been explicitly set and enabled, or if the 'Force' option is selected. Note that when enabled or forced, the dialog will be prompted for both internal and external URLs.

field.label: Notification Message
field.comment: This message serves as the default notification message for, cases in which a notification dialog is set to be forced, and there is no explicitly set on the redirect instance.

field.label: Dialog Visibility Duration
field.comment: The duration of dialog visibility is always specified in milliseconds and applies exclusively to notification dialogs. Leave this field empty to utilize the default system visibility duration.
